code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route}from'react-router-dom';import Navbar from'./Navbar';import CreateUser from'./CreateUser';import Login from'./Login';import Dashboard from'./Dashboard';import Home from'./Home';import CreateRecipe from'./CreateRecipe';import MyRecipes from'./MyRecipes';import FavoriteRecipes from'./FavoriteRecipes';import AllRecipes from'./AllRecipes';import EditRecipe from'./EditRecipe';import'./tailwind.css';import'./global.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[isLoggedIn,setIsLoggedIn]=useState(false);const handleLogin=loggedInUsername=>{setUsername(loggedInUsername);setIsLoggedIn(true);};const handleLogout=()=>{setUsername('');setIsLoggedIn(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{username:username,isLoggedIn:isLoggedIn,onLogout:handleLogout}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/create-user",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CreateUser,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/login",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{onLogin:handleLogin})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/dashboard",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboard,{username:username,onLogout:handleLogout})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/create-recipe",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CreateRecipe,{username:username})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/edit_recipe/:username/:recipe_id",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EditRecipe,{username:username})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/my-recipes",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MyRecipes,{username:username})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/favorite-recipes",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FavoriteRecipes,{username:username})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/all-recipes",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AllRecipes,{})})]})]})});}export default App;
